text:
Septic hip in pelvic fracture with urologic trauma: case report.
 Urologic injuries occur in 10% of pelvic fractures and hip sepsis is a rare complication.
 The symptoms of a septic hip are often not as dramatic when found in the setting of an acute pelvic fracture and may be overlooked.
 A case is presented with a review of the literature.
 Early recognition and aggressive surgical debridement are important to prevent the long-term sequelae of septic arthritis.
